hero.title: The Human-Readable Data Format
hero.subtitle: TOON is a modern, human-readable data serialization format that combines the familiarity of JSON with the readability of YAML and the efficiency of tabular data.

comparison.title: TOON vs JSON
comparison.savings: ~60% smaller file size with the same data

humanReadable.title: Human Readable
humanReadable.description: Clean, indentation-based syntax that's easy to read and write without special tooling.

compact.title: Compact Format
compact.description: Significantly smaller file sizes compared to JSON, saving bandwidth and storage.

tabular.title: Tabular Arrays
tabular.description: Native support for tabular data with field headers, perfect for lists and datasets.

efficient.title: High Performance
efficient.description: Fast parsing and serialization with minimal memory footprint.

jsonCompatible.title: JSON Compatible
jsonCompatible.description: Full JSON data model support – convert between TOON and JSON losslessly.

llmFriendly.title: LLM Friendly
llmFriendly.description: Optimized for AI/LLM context windows – more data with fewer tokens.

config.title: Configuration Files
config.description: Replace JSON/YAML configs with readable, maintainable TOON files.

data.title: Data Storage
data.description: Store structured data efficiently with excellent human readability.

ai.title: AI & LLM Prompts
ai.description: Maximize context window efficiency when working with AI models.

api.title: API Responses
api.description: Reduce payload sizes while maintaining human-debuggable responses.

indentation.title: Indentation-Based
indentation.description: Uses consistent 2-space indentation to define structure – no brackets needed.

headers.title: Array Headers
headers.description: Define array structure with headers like 'users[3]' followed by field names for tabular data.

primitives.title: Unquoted Primitives
primitives.description: Numbers, booleans, and null don't need quotes – just write them directly.

delimiters.title: Flexible Delimiters
delimiters.description: Use comma, tab, or pipe as delimiters for tabular rows.

cta.title: Ready to Try TOON?
cta.description: Use the TOON Viewer to parse, explore, and edit TOON data right in your browser.

explorer.title: Explorer
explorer.loadFile: Load a TOON file to get started

editor.placeholder: Enter or paste TOON data here...

input.title: TOON Input
input.subtitle: Paste or type TOON data to parse and explore

editModal.title: Edit Node
editModal.smartForm: Smart form based on existing items
